messageHandlers.script:
if payload['current'] == self.meta.name:
		if self.custom.submenuOpen == True:
			self.custom.submenuOpen = False
			self.getSibling("OverviewParticipants").position.display = False
			self.getSibling("Tasks").position.display = False
			self.getSibling("Assignments").position.display = False
			self.getSibling("Batch Services").position.display = False
			self.getSibling("Batch Programs").position.display = False
			self.getSibling("Campus Store").position.display = False
			self.getSibling("Storage Bins").position.display = False
			self.getSibling("Medications").position.display = False
			self.getSibling("Medication Report").position.display = False
		else:
			self.custom.submenuOpen = True 
			self.getSibling("OverviewParticipants").position.display = True
			self.getSibling("Tasks").position.display = True
			self.getSibling("Batch Services").position.display = True
			self.getSibling("Batch Programs").position.display = True
			self.getSibling("Medications").position.display = True
			self.getSibling("Medication Report").position.display = True
			if (self.session.custom.isWSManager or self.session.custom.isManager or self.session.custom.isAdministrator or self.session.custom.isSupportCoordinator or self.session.custom.isWSSupportCoordinator or self.session.custom.isCareCoordinator):
				self.getSibling("Campus Store").position.display = True
				self.getSibling("Storage Bins").position.display = True
			else:
				self.getSibling("Campus Store").position.display = False
				self.getSibling("Storage Bins").position.display = False
			
			## Assignments is visible only to managers and above
			if (self.session.custom.isWSManager or self.session.custom.isManager or self.session.custom.isAdministrator):
				self.getSibling("Assignments").position.display = True
			else:
				self.getSibling("Assignments").position.display = False
			
	elif payload['current'] == 'ParticipantsFromDetail':	
		self.custom.submenuOpen = True 
		self.getSibling("OverviewParticipants").position.display = True
		self.getSibling("Tasks").position.display = True
		
		self.getSibling("Batch Services").position.display = True
		self.getSibling("Batch Programs").position.display = True
		self.getSibling("Medications").position.display = True
		self.getSibling("Medication Report").position.display = True
		if (self.session.custom.isWSManager or self.session.custom.isManager or self.session.custom.isAdministrator or self.session.custom.isSupportCoordinator or self.session.custom.isWSSupportCoordinator or self.session.custom.isCareCoordinator):
			self.getSibling("Campus Store").position.display = True
			self.getSibling("Storage Bins").position.display = True
		else:
			self.getSibling("Campus Store").position.display = False
			self.getSibling("Storage Bins").position.display = False	
		
		## Assignments is visible only to managers and above
		if (self.session.custom.isWSManager or self.session.custom.isManager or self.session.custom.isAdministrator):
			self.getSibling("Assignments").position.display = True
		else:
			self.getSibling("Assignments").position.display = False
	else:
		self.custom.submenuOpen = False
		self.getSibling("OverviewParticipants").position.display = False
		self.getSibling("Tasks").position.display = False
		self.getSibling("Assignments").position.display = False
		self.getSibling("Batch Services").position.display = False
		self.getSibling("Batch Programs").position.display = False
		self.getSibling("Campus Store").position.display = False
		self.getSibling("Storage Bins").position.display = False
		self.getSibling("Medications").position.display = False
		self.getSibling("Medication Report").position.display = False

transforms.code:
loggedInStaff = value
	getHumanIfFromStaff = system.db.runPrepQuery("select * from [staff].[Employee] where id = "+str(loggedInStaff))
	if getHumanIfFromStaff.getRowCount()>0:
		loggedInStaffHumanId = getHumanIfFromStaff.getValueAt(0,'humanId')
	else:
		loggedInStaffHumanId = -1
	return loggedInStaffHumanId

onChange.script:
logger = system.util.getLogger("myLogger")
	logString = 'User ' + str(self.session.props.auth.user.userName) + ' has logged in to a Perspective session.'
	logger.info(logString)
